availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Kelon H. Oates (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer and wagoner )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, wagoner and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Zilphia Damaris Dillingham Oates. Father of George Oates, Mary P. Oates, Fannie E. Oates, Laura B. Oates, R. A. Oates, Emma Oates, and W. W. Oates. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Wagoner in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 49A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 771.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #15898.
